metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7152 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer over-read was discovered inwasm::WasmBinaryBuilder::processFunctions() in wasm/wasm-binary.cpp (whencalling wasm::WasmBinaryBuilder::getFunctionIndexName) in Binaryen 1.38.22.A crafted input can cause segmentation faults, leading todenial-of-service, as demonstrated by wasm-opt.

criterions.comment: binaryen package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
